price: Sema: Kukimbia hakukufaeni kitu ikiwa mnakimbia mauti au kuuwawa, na hata hivyo hamtastareheshwa ila kidogo tu.
arabic: قُل لَّن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلۡفِرَارُ إِن فَرَرۡتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ أَوِ ٱلۡقَتۡلِ وَإِذٗا لَّا تُمَتَّعُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
footnotes: Waambie: Kukimbia hakukufaeni kitu ikiwa ndio mnayakimbia mauti au kuuwawa, maadamu ajali yenu imekwisha fika. Na ikiwa haijafika, basi hamtobaki mkistarehe katika dunia ila kwa muda wa umri wenu, nao ni mchache.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul lan yanfaʿakumu al-firāru in farartum mina al-mawti awi al-qatli wa-idhan lā tumattaʿūna illā qalīlan
translations: you will be allowed to enjoy
